reviewText:
This is by far my favorite anime show ever. It is a fascinating tale of a young girl who dreams of becoming a prince, and the trials she must face. It is a superb storyline with wonderful animation and characterization.

But remember: This is only the first 2 episodes! I would highly recommend the entire series; truthfully, I don't much see the point of only buying the first 2 eps. Especially since the show gets so much better later on.

The only reason I gave my favorite anime 2 stars was becuase this has the first two episodes... this is a test drive... DON'T BUY THIS!!! BUY ALL THE OTHER DVDS OF UTENA!!!!!!!

I have all the Utena DVD's; all 39 episdoes and let me just say, this anime is AMAZING!! It is by-far my favorite anime... If you were debating over wheter to get this anime or not, get it. It's fabulous!! BUY IT NOW!!
